text: Gao XingjianGao Xingjian (; Wade-Giles: Kao Hsing-chien) (born January 4, 1940), is a Chinese-French writer. He was awarded the 2000 Nobel Prize in Literature.NobelPrize.org, "Gao Xingjian"; retrieved 2012-9-17. He is also a stage director and a painter. ==Related pages== * List of Nobel Prize winners by country *List of Chinese writers *List of Chinese painters ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:Chinese Nobel Prize winners Category:Chinese novelists Category:20th- century Chinese painters Category:French critics Category:French Nobel Prize winners Category:French novelists Category:French painters Category:French playwrights Category:French screenwriters Category:Chinese translators Category:People who lost Chinese citizenship Category:People from Jiangxi Category:20th-century novelists Category:21st-century novelists Category:21st- century Chinese people Category:20th-century Chinese people Category:21st- century Chinese painters
title: Gao Xingjian
